titles.title: To authorize appropriations for the National Sea Grant College Program Act for fiscal years 2009 through 2013.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, and Oceans.

bill.summary:
6/22/2007--Introduced.
Amends the National Sea Grant College Program Act to authorize appropriations for FY2009-FY2013 to carry out the Act.
